tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (DT The) (NN way) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB defeat) (NP (NN darkness)))))) (VP (VBZ is) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB bring) (ADJP (JJ light) (PP (TO to) (NP (PRP it)))))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [is/VBZ nsubj>[way/NN det>The/DT acl>[defeat/VB mark>to/TO dobj>darkness/NN]] xcomp>[bring/VB mark>to/TO xcomp>[light/JJ nmod:to>[it/PRP case>to/TO]]] punct>./.]
